# mclogit: Multinomial Logit Models for Categorical Responses and Discrete Choices

[![CRAN](http://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/mclogit)](http://cran.rstudio.com/package=mclogit)
[![Total downloads from RStudio CRAN
mirror](http://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/grand-total/mclogit)](http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/mclogit/index.md)
[![Current release on
GitHub](http://img.shields.io/github/release/melff/mclogit.svg)](http://github.com/melff/mclogit/releases/)
[![Total downloads from RStudio CRAN
mirror](http://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/mclogit)](http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/mclogit/index.md)

This packages provides estimators for multinomial logit models in their
conditional logit (for discrete choices) and baseline logit variants
(for categorical responses), optionally with overdispersion or random
effects. . Random effects models are estimated using the PQL technique
(based on a Laplace approximation) or the MQL technique (based on a
Solomon-Cox approximation). Estimates should be treated with caution if
the group sizes are small.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`Transport`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/Transport.md)
  : Choice of Means of Transport
- [`dispersion()`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/dispersion.md)
  : Overdispersion in Multinomial Logit Models
- [`electors`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/electors.md) :
  Class, Party Position, and Electoral Choice
- [`getSummary(`*`<mblogit>`*`)`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/getSummary-mclogit.md)
  [`getSummary(`*`<mclogit>`*`)`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/getSummary-mclogit.md)
  [`getSummary(`*`<mmblogit>`*`)`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/getSummary-mclogit.md)
  [`getSummary(`*`<mmclogit>`*`)`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/getSummary-mclogit.md)
  : \`getSummary\` Methods
- [`mblogit()`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/mblogit.md) :
  Baseline-Category Logit Models for Categorical and Multinomial
  Responses
- [`mclogit()`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/mclogit.md)
  [`update(`*`<mclogit>`*`)`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/mclogit.md)
  [`summary(`*`<mclogit>`*`)`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/mclogit.md)
  : Conditional Logit Models and Mixed Conditional Logit Models
- [`mclogit.fit()`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/mclogit.fit.md)
  [`mmclogit.fitPQLMQL()`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/mclogit.fit.md)
  : Internal functions used for model fit.
- [`mclogit.control()`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/mclogit_control.md)
  [`mmclogit.control()`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/mclogit_control.md)
  : Control Parameters for the Fitting Process
- [`predict(`*`<mblogit>`*`)`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/predict.md)
  [`predict(`*`<mclogit>`*`)`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/predict.md)
  [`predict(`*`<mmblogit>`*`)`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/predict.md)
  [`predict(`*`<mmclogit>`*`)`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/predict.md)
  : Predicting responses or linear parts of the baseline-category and
  conditional logit models
- [`rebase()`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/rebase.md) :
  Change baseline category of multinomial logit or similar model
- [`simulate(`*`<mblogit>`*`)`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/simulate.md)
  [`simulate(`*`<mclogit>`*`)`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/simulate.md)
  [`simulate(`*`<mmblogit>`*`)`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/simulate.md)
  [`simulate(`*`<mmclogit>`*`)`](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/reference/simulate.md)
  : Simulating responses from baseline-category and conditional logit
  models

# Articles

### The statistical models

- [Conditional logit
  models](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/articles/conditional-logit.md):
- [Baseline-category logit
  models](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/articles/baseline-logit.md):
- [The relation between baseline logit and conditional logit
  models](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/articles/baseline-and-conditional-logit.md):
- [Random effects in baseline logit models and conditional logit
  models](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/articles/random-effects.md):

### Technical aspects of model fitting

- [The IWLS algorithm used to fit conditional logit
  models](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/articles/fitting-mclogit.md):
- [Approximate Inference for Multinomial Logit Models with Random
  Effects](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/articles/approximations.md):
- [Bias reduction using Firth's penalized likelihood
  technique](https://melff.github.io/mclogit/articles/Firth-bias-reduction.md):
